registry.name: entrust
registry.description: Entrust a person with the `trusted` role.

registry.name: resolve
registry.description: Resolve an issue ticket and provide the applied solution.

registry.name: zap
registry.description: If a user is abusing their power, 2 people can use this command to un-entrust them.

registry.name: roll
registry.description: Roll a dice with a given number of sides.
